thread.title: Oscars: 'La La Land' Production Design Team Wins First Oscar
thread.title_full: Oscars: 'La La Land' Production Design Team Wins First Oscar

title: Oscars: 'La La Land' Production Design Team Wins First Oscar
text:
7:22pm PT by Carolyn Giardina Oscars: 'La La Land' Production Design Team Wins First Oscar Dale Robinette/Lionsgate The award went to David Wasco and Sandy Reynolds-Wasco. 
The Oscar for production design went to La La Land â€™s husband and wife team of production designer David Wasco and set decorator Sandy Reynolds-Wasco. 
"Damien (Chazelle), we wouldn't be here without you," David Wasco said, accepting the award. 
It was the first nomination and win for the pair, whose previous work has included Inglourious Basterds and Pulp Fiction. 
The win topped a field that included the teams behind Arrival; Fantastic Beasts and Where To Find Them; Hail, Caesar! and Passengers .
